attributes.action: Dissolve parliment and Call a general election
attributes.additional_details: They have gone back on their manifesto pledges and even tried to bring in laws etc that wasnt in their mandate, this is misleading the general public in parliament
attributes.background: The Labour Party has lied to the general public for to long, they are making u turn after u turn amd have lost all trust in the public, we need a referendum.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
